titles: The sum of a conference had between two divines of the Church of England and two Catholic lay-gentlemen at the request and for the satisfaction of three persons of quality, August 8, 1671.
author: Gooden, Peter, d. 1695.
publisher: Printed by Henry Hills ... for him and Matthew Turner,
notes: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Gooden.
"The two divines : Edward Stillingfleet and Gilbert Burnet. The two Catholic lay-gentlemen: Edward Coleman and Edward Meredith"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
